content: S-B (IF) Drywall screwdriver bit Customized screwdriver bit for drywall applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- - ### FEATURES:Features Optimized tip design for a secure fit in drywall screws and better visibility of the screw head Slim shank design ensures less drywall dust sticks to the bit and helps prevent damage to the drywall board paper Perfect-fit geometry for greater driving grip, precision-machined to help reduce stripping and wobbling Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common bit holders (DIN ISO 1173-D 6.3) Particularly suitable for use with drywall screwdrivers Fits all Phillips® 2 (PH2) screw heads ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 31/32 in Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039035 - Drywall insert bits #2 PHL 10 pk - Package Size 10 pc - 2039036 - Drywall insert bits #2 PHL 100 pk - Package Size 100 pc - 2039037 - Drywall insert bits #2 PHL 250 pk - Package Size 250 pc
